item.description:
Hello all -

It seems like there are definitely enough people to have a formal Meetup tomorrow morning. Dave told me the turn out from today's Meetup was great. Marc will be leading this meetup tomorrow morning, so if you'd rather attend a morning session instead of an afternoon session (or both), please feel free.

Please RSVP on the Meetup.com site by clicking the link in the email. We like to get a rough head-count so we know how many people will be attending.
item.name: Late Notice: Tennis Sunday Morning at Dugger Park - Medford
